Frequently Asked Questions

Q. What is Painting Therapy?

Painting Therapy is a Youtube series that features artist Thomas Windsor as he shares his emotions and celebrates nature through art.

Q. Do you ship internationally?

Yes! We do ship internationally!

Q. Can I get commission on a custom paper?

Yes! We do commission works!

Q. Will my paintings be signed?

Yes! All of our paintings are signed by Thomas Windsor.

Q. How long does shipping take?

Shipping usually takes 3-7 days, depending on your location.
